chatcal.config.description:
Config options:
- decimal_format: The format for displaying decimal numbers (default: #,##0.##)
- radians: Whether to use radians instead of degrees (default: false)
- copy_type: Where to save calculations (chat_history or clipboard)
- display_above: Show calculation preview above input (default: true)
chatcal.radians.description: radians=<true|false>: Sets whether to use radians or degrees for trigonometric functions
chatcal.copy_type.description: copy_type=<chat_history|clipboard>: Sets where to save your calculations
chatcal.decimal_format.description: decimal_format=<format>: Sets the format for displaying decimal numbers
chatcal.display_above.description: display_above=<true|false>: Sets whether to show calculation preview above input
